title: Automation Specialist
job_overview:
We’re looking for a detail-oriented Automation Specialist to help streamline our backend systems. You’ll be setting up around 10 automations inside Go High Level (GHL) and connecting them using Zapier to reduce repetitive manual work.

Requirements:
 • Proven experience with GHL automations (Workflows, Pipelines, Forms, Tags, etc.)
 • Comfortable building Zapier zaps (webhooks, triggers, data mapping)
 • Ability to take high-level ideas and turn them into clean, working flows
 • Strong attention to detail — no sloppy setups

Scope of Work Includes:
 • Automating client onboarding once invoices are paid in GHL
 • Triggering form submissions, welcome emails, and task assignments
 • Connecting GHL and Client Dispute Manager (CDM) via Zapier or parser email
 • Setting up basic filters, conditional logic, and internal alerts
 • Final testing to ensure everything works seamlessly

Ideal Candidate:
 • Tech-savvy but not overcomplicated
 • Can work independently and deliver within a few days
 • Communicates clearly and isn’t afraid to ask questions
 • Bonus if you’ve worked with credit repair or service-based businesses

Estimated Hours: 8–12 hours total
Must be able to Start: ASAP

To Apply:
Reply with the subject line:
Your First Name (AutoPilot)

And include the following:
 1. Years of experience with GHL + Zapier
 2. One automation you’re proud of
 3. Your availability to start
